name: Alien Shooting: Spaceship Mons
description:
You have been sent to a planet covered with Aliens. There is no army around to protect you. You are the lone sharpshooter and you have no choice but to defeat the attacking enem. Your task is to survive as long as possible. Hunt down and shoot as many alien invaders as possible. This space alien game is action packed and loaded with Alien fun. Survive as long as you can before the enemy fighters take you down.
Features:
- Ealistic 3D Killer Aliens
- Hunt down the Aliens before they hunt you.
- Awesome Sniper Simulation with super quality special effects
- Fast paced and addictive fun
- Excellent & real quality sounds.
- User friendly control.
